instruction: Come up with a recipe for a healthy salad.
output: This salad is a great way to get your daily dose of vitamins and nutrients. Start by washing and slicing two cups of dark, leafy greens. Through these in a bowl and add diced bell peppers, cucumbers and carrots in whatever combinations you desire. For a protein boost, add cooked, diced chicken. Finally, top with a few teaspoons of olive oil and a sprinkle of freshly-squeezed lemon juice for a light, refreshing dressing. Enjoy!
